achievements.title: NASSCOM Foundation's ThingQbator - Top 10 Finalist
achievements.description: Achieved Top 10 Finalist position with projects FHAIDA+CRM and AMYR. AMYR secured Rs.5 Lakh Seed Grant Funding and was selected for mentorship by the NASSCOM Foundation.

media.alt: AMYR - Rs.5 Lakh Seed Grant Funding

achievements.title: UDAAN 2023 Business Plan Competition - 1st Prize
achievements.description: Won 1st prize in the UDAAN 2023 Business Plan Competition at RGIPT, demonstrating exceptional business planning and presentation skills.

media.alt: Felicitated By Dr. V Narayanan, Chairman, ISRO
UDAAN 2023 Business Plan Competition - 1st Prize Certificate

achievements.title: Smart India Hackathon 2024 - Winner
achievements.description: Led the Mini Juris 2.0 team to victory at Smart India Hackathon 2024 with the ESG Post Office Initiativeâ€”a digital solution that transformed Indian Postal Services through sustainable practices.

achievements.title: Digital Marketing Success with Aastee.com
achievements.description: Worked as a Digital Marketing Manager with Aastee.com (Real Estate Company) and successfully generated 900 leads from YouTube, demonstrating strong digital marketing capabilities.

achievements.title: Codeiam Hackathon 2024 - 1st Prize
achievements.description: Won 1st prize at the Codeiam Hackathon held on July 14th, 2024, organized by Codeiam Club. Demonstrated exceptional coding skills and innovative problem solving abilities in Visakhapatnam District Level Hackathon
achievements.project: Smart CRM System in Google Sheets

achievements.title: Multiple Hackathons and Competitions Finalist
achievements.description: Finalist in various national and international hackathons and competitions, consistently demonstrating problem-solving skills and innovative thinking.
